Just ask about her previous relationships after sharing details about your previous relationship, then stating that you are still a virgin and ask if she is same. Also you can ask her about what she thinks necessary in a relationship, and when she asks you the same you tell her that you value virginity. Ask her decently, and if she still gets angry or irritated it is not your fault. She should also respect and understand your relationship viewpoints as well
